original: intros T n x2 x1 v2 v1. split. - intros H i H0. destruct v1 as [t1 v1']. destruct v2 as [t2 v2']. simpl. induction i. + simpl. destruct v1'. destruct v2'. reflexivity. + simpl. apply (IHn T0 v1' v2'). simpl in H. apply H. - intros H. apply nat_ind. + intros i H0. inversion H0. + intros i H0. destruct v1 as [t1 v1']. destruct v2 as [t2 v2']. simpl. apply (H i). apply lt_n_S. apply H0.
